attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a first time buyer i have been shocked and stressed by the abuse of the system that my freeholder is able to and has been able to get away with. Isn't it about time that those that pay for the maintainence/up keep/ultimately stopping the property from falling into disrepair as well as living in it (the leaseholder) be protected better. Change the law, please.
